name: Gabite
author: Ken Sugimori
flavor_text: There is a long-held belief that medicine made from its scale will heal even incurable illnesses.

attacks.name: Gather Up
attacks.effect: Search your discard pile for up to 2 Energy cards, show them to your opponent, and put them into your hand.

attacks.name: Marvelous Shine
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads put 4 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. If tails, remove 4 damage counters from 1 of your Pokémon.
